existing_features.title: Ensure the only “Follow Us” social icon set in the UI is the existing footer social section (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) using SOCIAL_LINKS (frontend/src/constants/socialLinks.ts), and do not add or keep an additional social icon row at the bottom of the landing page.
Remove unused social-icon dependencies/imports from frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx after removing the duplicated social icons section (e.g., react-icons imports) to keep the bundle clean.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update social icons to be colorful/original and linked, without adding a new set of icons at the bottom (keep/restore intended placement).

Make the footer social icons appear as colorful, original/official full-color platform icons and ensure each icon click opens the correct outbound link behavior defined in frontend/src/constants/socialLinks.ts (including deep-link fallback behavior).

projectName: Use colorful original social icons with links and remove duplicate social icons at the bottom
